Hey, all! Come sign-up for Worldwide D&D Game Day.

Come play a session of 4th Edition D&D. The adventure will be a chance to try out the new races and classes from Players Handbook II. There are limited spots for gaming, so please sign-up in advance.

You can sign-up as a player at at http://www.warhorn.ne... If there are no slots available when you check, check back, as more splots may open as more people volunteer to be Dungeon Masters. If you want to be a DM, you can do that through Warhorn as well.

Please note that RSVPing here does not sign you up for a slot. Please follow the link for that.

Hope to see folks there!

- Andy


Some more details:

One Dark Night in Weeping Briar

Written by Greg Marks

A fierce nighttime storm drives you to the lonely farming community of Weeping Briar in search of shelter, but the town is suspiciously empty. A small girl holds the key to the mass disappearance, if you can rescue her from what prowls the streets and lairs beneath the town before itâ€™s too late!

Characters are 11th level

Ilvarra, drow avenger
Markaria, tiefling invoker
Roswyn, gnome bard
Squeaks, warforged barbarian
Balasar, dragonborn paladin (uses material from the upcoming Divine Power product)
